summary: Install the Z Initial Program Loader (zipl) with 'IBM Secure Execution'
description: This will install the Z Initial Program Loader for the
- `location`, which specifies is the offset of the partition containing `/se`
within the device that is specified via `disk`.
- `ignition_gpg_pubkey`, which specifies filename for public GPG key
- `hostkey`, which specifies Hostkey for given IBM Z machine
More details could be found here: https://github.com/coreos/enhancements/blob/main/os/20211014-s390x-secure-execution.md
